# setURL(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the destination for the link as a URL.

## Declaration

```swift
func setURL(_ url: URL!)
```

## Working with link destinations

- **destination()**: Gets the destination for the link when the destination was specified as a PDFDestination object.
- **setDestination(_:)**: Sets the destination for the link as a PDFDestination object.
- **url()**: Gets the destination for the link when the destination was specified as a URL.
